languages.text: "Разводить анархию на корабле — первый шаг в объятья Хаоса. Еще хуже — давать оружие в неподготовленные руки. И блюстители нужны для контроля и порядка. Откажитесь от этого требования — и мы можем обсудить остальное".

"Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the enforcers are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."
languages.original_text: "Разводить анархию на корабле — первый шаг в объятья Хаоса. Еще хуже — давать оружие в неподготовленные руки. И блюстители нужны для контроля и порядка. Откажитесь от этого требования — и мы можем обсудить остальное".

traits.locale_text: "Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the guards are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."

"Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the guards are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."

"Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the guards are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."

"Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the enforcers are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."

languages.text: “在船上散布无政府状态，是向混沌倒戈的第一步。如果让未经训练的人拿到了武器，结果会更加糟糕。不仅如此，执法者是用来维持监督与秩序的人员。你们先撤回这些要求，我们再考虑其余的要求。”
languages.original_text: "Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the enforcers are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."

traits.locale_text: “在船上散布无政府状态，是向混沌倒戈的第一步。如果让未经训练的人拿到了武器，结果会更加糟糕。不仅如此，镇压者是用来维持监督与秩序的人员。你们先撤回这些要求，我们再考虑其余的要求。”

languages.text: «Extender la anarquía por esta nave es el primer paso hacia el Caos. Armar a gente no entrenada sería aún peor. Y, además, necesitamos a los guardias para mantener el orden y supervisar su trabajo. Retire esas demandas y consideraremos las demás».
languages.original_text: "Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the enforcers are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."

traits.locale_text: «Extender la anarquía por esta nave es el primer paso hacia el Caos. Armar a gente no entrenada sería aún peor. Y, además, necesitamos a los guardias para mantener el orden y supervisar su trabajo. Retire esas demandas y consideraremos las demás».

languages.text: 「船内に無秩序を蔓延させることは、渾沌を受け入れる第一歩だ。訓練を受けていない者の手に武器を渡すことは、さらに悪いことだ。監視と秩序を維持するためにはエンフォーサーが必要だ。これらの要求を撤回すれば、残りは検討してやろう」
languages.original_text: "Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the enforcers are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."

traits.locale_text: 「船内に無秩序を蔓延させることは、渾沌を受け入れる第一歩だ。訓練を受けていない者の手に武器を渡すことは、さらに悪いことだ。監視と秩序を維持するためにはエンフォーサーが必要だ。これらの要求を撤回すれば、残りは検討してやろう」

languages.text: "Wenn man der Anarchie gestattet, auf dem Schiff Fuß zu fassen, ist das der erste Schritt ins Chaos. Noch schlimmer wäre es, Waffen in nicht ausgebildete Hände zu legen. Mehr noch, die Enforcers werden benötigt, um für Ordnung zu sorgen. Zieht diese Forderungen zurück, dann bedenken wir die übrigen."
languages.original_text: "Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the enforcers are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn man der Anarchie gestattet, auf dem Schiff Fuß zu fassen, ist das der erste Schritt ins Chaos. Noch schlimmer wäre es, Waffen in nicht ausgebildete Hände zu legen. Mehr noch, die Enforcers werden benötigt, um für Ordnung zu sorgen. Zieht diese Forderungen zurück, dann bedenken wir die übrigen."

languages.text: « Semer l'anarchie à bord du vaisseau n'est guère que la première étape vers le Chaos. Et ce serait encore pire si nous armions des combattants inexpérimentés. Par ailleurs, les prévôts sont là pour assurer l'ordre et la sécurité de l'équipage. Renoncez à ces exigences, et nous réfléchirons à vos autres revendications. »
languages.original_text: "Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the enforcers are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."

traits.locale_text: « Semer l'anarchie à bord du vaisseau n'est guère que la première étape vers le Chaos. Et ce serait encore pire si nous armions des combattants inexpérimentés. Par ailleurs, les prévôts sont là pour assurer l'ordre et la sécurité de l'équipage. Renoncez à ces exigences, et nous réfléchirons à vos autres revendications. »

languages.text: "Gemide kargaşa yaymak, Kaos'a kucak açmanın ilk adımıdır. Talim görmemiş ellere silah tutturarak bunu daha da körüklemiş oluruz. Dahası, gözetim ve düzenin korunması için infazcılara muhtacız. Bu taleplerinizi geri çekerseniz diğer isteklerinizi gözden geçirebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Spreading anarchy on the ship is the first step toward embracing Chaos. Putting weapons into untrained hands would be even worse. What's more, the enforcers are needed to maintain oversight and order. Withdraw those demands and we will consider the rest."
